body:
I've recently been interested in C4D, Blender, and AE cs6. I just took a template, and went crazy and kinda made it my own x3. Just need some opinions on the Intro. Also I made an Intro for my friend, take a look:

Mine: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NVW0HytghOA
Lawley / CreepyBurito (MY friends): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r4sEv_sulng

Btw, he's also a Graphics Designer ;), Check em out:
 
(He made me this Banner) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tMpeNbnL_A4
                                                          https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtVZYMdluA95xWQjbz5nL3g
 
My friend, will be opening his shop tomorrow, so hang on, while thats going on, request your orders below :)

======================================
Requirements for VFX: vsplesk.chat.mc
 _Phyre | мσтιση dεsιgη | Icarus US: (Opening Soon)

Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r4sEv_sulng
=======================================
Requirements for GFX: xkeyslaw
εclιpsε - ∂εsιgη's GFX Shop: (Open tomorrow)
